meta.title: Edit Profile - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Update your username and profile picture easily on Essaimons-V1. Manage your personal information securely.
meta.keywords: edit profile, update username, change profile picture, user settings, Essaimons-V1

export-data.title: Download your data
export-data.description: Export a structured copy of your account details and related proposals.
export-data.success: Your data export has started downloading.
export-data.error: We could not export your data right now. Please try again later.

notifications.title: Notification preferences
notifications.description: Choose how you want to receive notifications for each type of event

channels_explanation.title: Notification types
channels_explanation.in_app: Notifications displayed in the application when you are logged in. Appear in real-time in the navigation bar.
channels_explanation.email: Notifications sent to your email address. You will receive a message even if you are not logged in.
channels_explanation.push: Notifications sent directly to your device (browser or mobile). Requires enabling push notifications in your browser.

email_frequency.title: Email notification frequency
email_frequency.description: Choose how often you want to receive email notifications. Notifications will be batched and sent according to your preference.

devices.title: Push notification devices
devices.description: Manage devices registered to receive push notifications
devices.empty: No devices registered for push notifications
devices.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
devices.info_description: Push notifications are sent to your registered devices even when the application is closed. Remove inactive or unknown devices for security.

meta.title: Reset Password - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link. The email field is prefilled if you are logged in.
meta.keywords: reset password, password recovery, forgot password, password reset email, Essaimons-V1

meta.title: Password Reset Confirmation - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Confirm your password reset by clicking the link sent to your email. Securely update your password and regain access to your account.
meta.keywords: password reset confirmation, reset password, email verification, Essaimons-V1

actions.view-all-voting: View all proposals to vote on

meta.title: Welcome to Essaimons-V1 - Your Full-Stack Starter Solution
meta.description: Get started quickly with Essaimons-V1, a powerful full-stack starter template combining Adonis backend and Svelte frontend. Build your projects faster and smarter.
meta.keywords: Adonis starter kit, Svelte starter kit, full-stack template, web development, backend, frontend, Essaimons-V1

resend.info: Your account is waiting for confirmation. Check your inbox or resend the activation email.

meta.title: Login - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Log in to Essaimons-V1 using your email and password, or quickly via Google, GitHub, or Discord OAuth.
meta.keywords: login, sign in, email login, password login, OAuth login, Google login, GitHub login, Discord login, Essaimons-V1

meta.title: Create Your Account - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Sign up for Essaimons-V1 by creating your account with username, email, and password. Or quickly register using Google, Discord, or GitHub.
meta.keywords: create account, sign up, register, username, email, password, OAuth, Google login, Discord login, GitHub login, Essaimons-V1

meta.title: Confirm Logout - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Are you sure you want to log out? Confirm your logout to end your session safely on Essaimons-V1.
meta.keywords: confirm logout, logout confirmation, end session, Essaimons-V1

modal.title: Logout
modal.text: Are you sure you want to logout ?

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.subtitle: You are not authorized to view this page.

meta.title: Unauthorized Access - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Your credentials do not grant access to this page. Please log in or contact support if you think this is a mistake.
meta.keywords: unauthorized access, 401 error, login required, permission denied, Essaimons-V1

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.subtitle: You have to be logged to access this app's part.

meta.title: Access Forbidden - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: You do not have permission to access this page. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
meta.keywords: access forbidden, 403 error, permission denied, restricted access, Essaimons-V1

meta.title: Page Not Found - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: The page you are looking for does not exist. Check the URL or return to the homepage of Essaimons-V1.
meta.keywords: 404 error, page not found, missing page, Essaimons-V1

meta.title: Already Logged In - Return to Your Dashboard | Essaimons-V1
meta.description: You're already logged in to Essaimons-V1. Continue to your dashboard or return to the homepage to explore more features.
meta.keywords: already logged in, user session, dashboard, homepage, Essaimons-V1

meta.title: Unknown Error - Something Went Wrong | Essaimons-V1
meta.description: An unexpected error occurred while using the Essaimons-V1. Please try again later or return to the homepage for support.
meta.keywords: unknown error, unexpected issue, error handling, troubleshooting, Essaimons-V1

match.countPlural=zero: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the users and all related data.
match.countPlural=one: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the user and all related data.
match.countPlural=other: Are you sure you want to delete {users} ? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the users and all related data.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Review and maintain the list of proposal categories available in the application.

email_templates.title: Email Templates
email_templates.description: Customize the HTML email templates used for notifications. Use Handlebar variables for dynamic content.
email_templates.subject: Subject
email_templates.variables_help: Available Handlebar variables: title, message, actionUrl, baseUrl, organizationName, count, notifications (for digest)

organization.title: Settings
organization.description: Update the public information displayed in the sidebar and footer.

fields.name: Organization name

logo.title: Logo
logo.placeholder: Upload a square logo (PNG, JPG, SVG, WEBP)

fields.default-locale-tooltip: The default language is shown to unauthenticated visitors and when the browser language is not available. Leave empty to use the fallback language.
fields.fallback-locale-tooltip: The fallback language is used when a translation is not available in the user's preferred language. It ensures there is always content to display.

source-code-url.invalid: Please enter a valid URL for {locale}.
source-code-url.required: Source code link is required for fallback locale {locale}.
source-code-url.max: Source code link must be 2000 characters or fewer for {locale}.

crop.title: Adjust logo
crop.instructions: Drag to reposition the logo. Use the slider to zoom in or out so it fills the square.
crop.unsupported: Canvas is not supported in your browser

propositions.description: Configure default offsets applied when creating a proposal. Each value represents days after the previous milestone.

permissions.title: Permissions by status
permissions.hint: Enable the actions allowed for each role and status.
permissions.no-role: No role configured for this status.
permissions.no-action: No action defined for this role.

prompts.role-name: Name of the new role for {status}
prompts.action-name: Name of the new action for {role} ({status})

errors.role-unavailable: This role is not available for this status.
errors.role-exists: This role already exists for this status.
errors.role-invalid: The role name must contain alphanumeric characters.
errors.action-unavailable: This action is not available for this role.
errors.action-exists: This action already exists for this role.
errors.action-invalid: The action name must contain alphanumeric characters.
errors.role-needs-action: A custom role must include at least one action.

error.no_selection: Please select at least one proposition to export
error.default: Unable to export propositions at the moment

options.title: Export Options
options.description: Select the data to include in the export

error.invalid_file: Please select a valid JSON file

upload.title: Upload Export File
upload.description: Select the JSON file exported from another environment
upload.drag: Drag and drop your JSON file here

resolve.title: Conflict Resolution
resolve.description: Resolve detected conflicts before proceeding with the import
resolve.no_conflicts: No conflicts detected! You can proceed with the import.
resolve.errors_desc: These conflicts must be resolved to continue
resolve.warnings_desc: These conflicts are optional but recommended

error.unresolved: Please resolve all critical conflicts before continuing

execute.title: Import Execution
execute.description: Review the summary before launching the final import

warning.title: Warning
warning.message: This action will modify the database. Make sure you have reviewed all resolutions.

proposition-create.title: Create a proposal
proposition-create.introduction: Work through the three steps to cover concretization, horizontality, and robustness. Fields marked with an asterisk are required.

meta.title: New proposal - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Capture the core details, deadlines, and impacts needed to formalize a complete proposal on Essaimons-V1.
meta.keywords: proposal, create proposal, SMART objectives, impacts, deadlines, Essaimons-V1

concretization.title: Concretization details
concretization.description: Set the tone with the title, categories, detailed description, and SMART objectives.

horizontality.title: Horizontality details
horizontality.description: Clarify the background summary, key deadlines, and mandate descriptions.

robustness.title: Robustness details
robustness.description: Analyse impacts, required expertise, and related proposals.

title.label: Title
title.info: The title highlights the objective or issue addressed. Mention a target date when helpful and avoid generic openings like “Proposal for…”.

visual.label: Visual
visual.info: Add a representative visual to help people recognise the proposal quickly. Image formats such as PNG, JPG, or WEBP are recommended.

categories.label: Categories
categories.info: Categories make triage and processing easier: level (strategic, tactical), confidentiality (public, restricted), legality, or theme (field, communication, etc.).

smart-objectives.label: SMART objectives
smart-objectives.info: SMART objectives explain how success will be measured (quantitative, qualitative, or time-bound) and confirm the expected outcome.

attachments.label: Attachments
attachments.info: Add supporting documents (analysis, templates, spreadsheets, etc.) that provide additional context.

detailed-description.label: Detailed description
detailed-description.info: Describe envisioned scenarios, the actions and their sequence, and reference any supporting documents (links, attachments, data, …).

summary.label: Summary (or context)
summary.info: Explain where the proposal comes from: idea, identified issue, triggering event, preparatory meetings, or previous proposals.

mandates-description.label: Mandate description
mandates-description.info: Detail the actions per mandate, linked SMART objectives, estimated resources, required skills, and how each mandate will be assigned.

clarification-deadline.label: Clarification deadline
clarification-deadline.info: Latest date to clarify the initial content with stakeholders.

amendment-deadline.label: Amendment deadline
amendment-deadline.info: Target date to finalise adjustments based on feedback.

vote-deadline.label: Vote deadline
vote-deadline.info: Planned date to submit the proposal for a vote or formal decision.

mandate-deadline.label: Mandate rollout deadline
mandate-deadline.info: Date by which mandates should be up and running if the proposal is adopted.

evaluation-deadline.label: Evaluation deadline
evaluation-deadline.info: Date when results and impacts will be assessed.

impacts.label: Impacts (human, financial, geographic, organisational)
impacts.info: Identify the needed resources, impacted audiences, expected benefits, and potential risks. Consider multiple scenarios and, if useful, conduct a SWOT-style review.

expertise.label: Expertise to involve
expertise.info: List the people or groups whose knowledge would help to evaluate or implement the proposal.

associated-propositions.label: Associated proposals
associated-propositions.info: Reference proposals this one depends on, complements, or conflicts with. This supports coherent planning and impact analysis.

rescue-initiators.label: Rescue initiators
rescue-initiators.info: Select at least one co-responsible person who can take over if needed. Their involvement can be detailed in the description or mandates.

navigation.concretization-hint: Complete the general framing before moving to collaborative aspects.
navigation.horizontality-hint: Document the shared context, deadlines, and mandates.
navigation.robustness-hint: Assess impacts, required expertise, and connections to other proposals.

crop.title: Adjust visual
crop.instructions: Resize and crop the image so it fits the proposal layout.

meta.title: Edit {title} - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Update the proposal "{title}" to keep its information current.

proposition-list.title: Browse proposals
proposition-list.introduction: Filter, search, and explore published proposals to prepare reviews or collaborative sessions.

meta.title: Browse proposals - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Navigate through the available proposals, apply category filters, and open detailed views to prepare discussions.

meta.title: Proposal {title} - Essaimons-V1
meta.description: Review "{summary}" in detail: objectives, impacts, mandates, and attachments ready for offline sharing.

delete.title: Delete proposal
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. The proposal and all related files will be permanently removed.

comments.empty: No contributions recorded for this section yet.

dialog.title: Share a clarification
dialog.description: Clarification messages are visible to all authenticated participants.
dialog.label: Clarification message

amendment-dialog.title: Share an amendment
amendment-dialog.description: Amendment comments are shared with contributors involved in this phase.
amendment-dialog.label: Amendment message

reply-dialog.title: Reply to clarification
reply-dialog.description: Post a follow-up directly in this clarification thread.
reply-dialog.label: Your reply

comments.delete-confirm-description: This clarification will be permanently removed.
comments.delete-confirm-description-reply: This reply will be permanently removed.

events.empty: No collective session has been scheduled yet.

dialog.title: Schedule an exchange
dialog.description: Inform participants about upcoming discussions or key milestones.
dialog.edit-description: Update the session details to keep everyone aligned.

delete.title: Delete exchange
delete.description: This exchange will be removed from the proposal timeline.

votes.empty: No vote has been configured yet.

dialog.title: Configure a vote
dialog.description: Define the voting method, schedule and available options before it opens.

votes.options-empty: Please provide at least one voting option.
votes.max-invalid: Maximum selections must be at least 1.

errors.max-selections-invalid: Maximum selections must be a positive number
errors.options-required: At least one option is required
errors.close-before-open: Closing date must be after opening date

mandates.empty: No mandates have been created yet.

dialog.title: Create a mandate
dialog.description: Assign responsibilities and track deliverables for this proposal.

delete.title: Delete mandate
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this mandate? This action cannot be undone.

accept.title: Accept this application
accept.description: By accepting this application, the mandated user will be assigned and all other pending applications will be automatically rejected. This action is irreversible.

deliverables.file-required: Please select a file to upload.

dialog.title: Upload a deliverable
dialog.description: Attach the latest version of the deliverable. Deadlines will be recalculated automatically.

deliverables.label: Label (optional)

evaluate.title: Evaluate deliverable
evaluate.description: Record your assessment and optionally add a comment.

followup.permissions-empty: No permissions defined for this status.

dialog.title: Update proposal status
dialog.description: Choose the next stage in the workflow. Permissions are verified before applying the transition.

prompt.title: Enable Push Notifications
prompt.description: Stay updated with real-time notifications even when the app is closed.

to_evaluate.title: Proposal in evaluation
to_evaluate.message: The proposal "{propositionTitle}" is now in evaluation phase

to_vote.title: Proposal Under Vote
to_vote.message: The proposal "{propositionTitle}" is now submitted for voting

to_mandate.title: Proposal Validated
to_mandate.message: The proposal "{propositionTitle}" has been validated and moves to mandate phase

mandate_assigned.title: Mandate assigned to you
mandate_assigned.message: You have been assigned the mandate "{mandateTitle}" for proposal "{propositionTitle}"

mandate_revoked.title: Mandate revoked
mandate_revoked.message: Your mandate "{mandateTitle}" for "{propositionTitle}" has been revoked

deliverable_uploaded.title: New deliverable to evaluate
deliverable_uploaded.message: A deliverable has been uploaded for mandate "{mandateTitle}" in "{propositionTitle}"

deliverable_evaluated.title: Your deliverable was evaluated
deliverable_evaluated.message: Your deliverable for "{mandateTitle}" in "{propositionTitle}" has been evaluated

exchange_scheduled.title: Exchange scheduled
exchange_scheduled.message: A new exchange "{eventTitle}" has been scheduled for "{propositionTitle}"
